title: Riot Made A Mistake

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body: Riot i do believe you have made a mistake in suspending my account as i thought you didn't suspend people in blind [](https://imgur.com/a/N4omp)

replies.body:
Heya, I changed your name to help offer a better experience for you and those around you.  Changing it back to an offensive or racist name will likely result in your account being locked down so take care!  

Any matchmade game mode or modes with other players will have access to the Instant Feedback System.  The best rule of thumb here is to be mindful of chat whenever there are other players in your match.  If you have any questions or concerns about the suspension itself, our PB is available directly through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

You can get banned in any game mode. Well besides maybe practice mode.

Judging from your username, I'm not terribly surprised if you have bans coming your way.
i didnt even think riot ever banned players thats weird, usually they just pretend to do stuff and hopes the community doesnt realize their retardation
